verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> <S%H146>were<s%>, Addar, and <S%H1617>Gera<s%>, and <S%H31>Abihud<s%>,

And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H261>Ehud<s%>: these are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1387>Geba<s%>, and they <S%H1540>removed<s%> them to <S%H4506>Manahath<s%>:
And <S%H5283>Naaman<s%>, and <S%H281>Ahiah<s%>, and <S%H1617>Gera<s%>, he <S%H1540>removed<s%> <S%H3205>them<s%>, and fathered <S%H5798>Uzza<s%>, and <S%H284>Ahihud<s%>.

And <S%H7842>Shaharaim<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> sons in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H4480>after<s%> he had sent them <S%H7971>away<s%>; <S%H2366>Hushim<s%> and <S%H1199>Baara<s%> were his <S%H802>wives<s%>.
And he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> of <S%H2321>Hodesh<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H3103>Jobab<s%>, and <S%H6644>Zibia<s%>, and <S%H4331>Mesha<s%>, and <S%H4445>Malcham<s%>,
And <S%H3263>Jeuz<s%>, and <S%H7634>Shachia<s%>, and <S%H4821>Mirma<s%>. These were his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H508>Elpaal<s%>; <S%H5677>Eber<s%>, and <S%H4936>Misham<s%>, and <S%H8106>Shamed<s%>, who <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H207>Ono<s%>, and <S%H3850>Lod<s%>, with the towns <S%H1323>there<s%>:

<S%H1283>Beriah<s%> <S%H8087>also<s%>, and Shema, <S%H1992>who<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H357>Aijalon<s%>, who drove <S%H1272>away<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>:
These were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3427>men<s%>. These lived in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>; whose <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maachah<s%>:
And his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon<s%>, and <S%H6698>Zur<s%>, and <S%H7027>Kish<s%>, and <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>,

And <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H8039>Shimeah<s%>. And these <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> with their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, over against <S%H5048>them<s%>.

And <S%H5369>Ner<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H7027>Kish<s%>, and <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, and <S%H4444>Malchi<s%>–shua, and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and <S%H792>Esh<s%>–baal.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H6377>were<s%>, Pithon, and <S%H4429>Melech<s%>, and <S%H8390>Tarea<s%>, and <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>.

And <S%H682>Azel<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are <S%H5840>these<s%>, Azrikam, <S%H1074>Bocheru<s%>, and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, and <S%H8187>Sheariah<s%>, and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, and <S%H2605>Hanan<s%>. All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H682>Azel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6232>Eshek<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H198>were<s%>, Ulam his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, <S%H3266>Jehush<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, and <S%H467>Eliphelet<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H198>Ulam<s%> were <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, <S%H1869>archers<s%>, and had <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1121>sons<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>. All these are of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.
